TopicTitle: about the economy feature that planned...

Articles.Content: will there be some parts for reuseable vehicle, like a space shuttle or something? cause if we will have to manage budget for missions in carreer, it will be obvious if we will want to use reuseable things...
You'll probably get some money back from things you recover

We'll have to wait and see when it is released.

Reusability in the real world is costly as the parts have to be validated before reuse; some have even suggested that fully disposable rockets are cheaper overall, at least in comparison to the Space Shuttle. It'll be interesting to see what factor of recovered parts' costs are recovered, if any.
